text: Aechmea lugoi is a species of plant in the family Bromeliaceae. It is endemic to the Pastaza region of Ecuador.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss.Manzanares, J.M. & Pitman, N. 2003. Aechmea lugoi. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
